notesStmt.note: A translation, by Edward Coffin, of: Marcus Antonius de Dominis archiepisc. Spalaten. sui reditus ex Anglia consilium exponit.
Running title reads: M. Antonius de Dominis his recantation.
Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
Tightly bound; pages 4-5, 34-45, 54-55 from Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy filmed at end.
